title: goinstall support git repository on googlecode.com
body:
According to http://golang.org/cmd/goinstall/

<snpipped>
Google Code Project Hosting (Mercurial, Subversion)

	import "project.googlecode.com/hg"
	import "project.googlecode.com/hg/sub/directory"

	import "project.googlecode.com/svn/trunk"
	import "project.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/sub/directory"
<snipped>

git repository is not supported.

Please support git repository on googlecode.
